author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10010244

A once-thriving land, this never-before-seen region was struck by a terrible calamity. The gods of nature vanished, causing the land to wither and the people to suffer. Step into the role of the Earth Dancer, and call upon unique powers to battle blighted monsters and restore the land, people, villages, and even gods to their natural glory. Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma presents an all-new experience that expands on the series' action RPG and life-sim elements to deliver an epic adventure that boldly reimagines the fan-favorite franchise, arriving on PlayStation 5 on February 13, 2026!

#ps5 #ps5games #runefactoryguardiansofazuma
title: Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma - Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10015602/

Death Howl launches on February 19th on PlayStation 5.

In this new trailer, discover 11 essential truths about the grim world of Death Howl, revealed through a deck of symbolic cards - Death, Battle, Mastery, Grief, and more. Each card unveils a defining feature or theme that shapes Ro’s journey through the spirit realm.

From turn-based, grid-bound combat and strategic deck-building to the raw, emotional weight of a mother’s grief, Death Howl offers a genre-blending experience rooted in sorrow, survival, and spirit.

Craft your deck. Face the unknown. Master your path.
Death Howl arrives February 19th.

#ps5 #ps5games #deathhowl
title: Death Howl - 11 Facts | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10008442/

"Factional turmoil and the hunger to bend the City to one’s doctrine take center stage in Fractured Utopias, the first DLC for Frostpunk 2 - out now on PlayStation 5. 

Expanding the sandbox-focused Utopia Builder mode, Fractured Utopias deepens its political struggle for the future with over 100 new narrative events and tons of unique unlocks. 

As the elders say: “In the Frostland, no utopia warms every soul.”"

#ps5 #ps5games #frostpunk2
title: Frostpunk 2 - Fractured Utopias Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/the-alters/

"The Alters - Free Major Content Update is available now on PlayStation 5!

Jump back into Jan Dolski’s journey with the first Free Major Content Update for The Alters, bringing new systems, fresh customization options, and player-requested features to the game.

✔ What’s new in today’s update:
• Base & suit skins - personalize your setup and change your look
• New Gamer’s Den module - build it and make your base feel more like home
• Relax Mode - enjoy the story without intense survival pressure
• Revamped saving system - save on exit and during key gameplay moments"

#ps5 #ps5games #thealters
title: The Alters - Free Major Update Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10015602

Death Howl launches February 19 on PlayStation 5.

Descend into a decaying spirit realm in this genre-blending experience that fuses soulslike structure, tactical grid-based combat, deck-building, and open-world exploration.

Play as Ro, a grieving mother on a desperate journey to save her deceased son, Oli. Explore a sorrowful, mystical world brought to life through moody, minimalist pixel art—and uncover a narrative shaped by grief, acceptance, and the will to fight through despair.

#ps5 #ps5games #deathhowl
title: Death Howl - Console Date Reveal Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10015829

Celebrate the Like a Dragon & Yakuza Series' 20th Anniversary with Yakuza 0 Director's Cut, Yakuza Kiwami, and Yakuza Kiwami 2, now available on PlayStation 5.

Yakuza 0 Director's Cut is  the prequel to the Yakuza series, featuring all-new cutscenes, online multiplayer mode, English dub, French/Italian/German/Spanish/Latam Spanish/Brazilian Portuguese/Russian text support & more. 

Yakuza Kiwami - The story that started the series, now with French/Italian/German/Spanish/Latam Spanish/Brazilian Portuguese/Russian text support & more. 

Yakuza Kiwami 2 - The direct sequel to the original story, now with French/Italian/German/Spanish/Latam Spanish/Brazilian Portuguese/Russian text support & more.

#ps5 #ps5games #likeadragon #yakuzalikeadragon
title: Like a Dragon & Yakuza Series 20th Anniversary Titles - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

description:
https://store.playstation.com/product/UP0097-PPSA28866_00-IAMFUTUREGAME000

I Am Future is a relaxing single-player survival game about building a cozy rooftop camp amid a flooded post-apocalyptic city. Set up a farm, go fishing, tinker with gadgets, craft new tools, manage a team of cute robots to automate and expand your base, explore the mysterious world, and chill out!

#ps5 #ps5games #iamfuture
title: I Am Future: Cozy Apocalypse Survival - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10016744

At first glance CASSETTE BOY looks like a charming pixel-style adventure, but beneath the surface lies something far more complex.1

What seems like a flat 2D pixel world is in fact a three-dimensional space. By rotating the environment, the boundaries of existence shift. What comes into view becomes real, and what slips away from sight fades into nothingness.

To solve puzzles you’ll need to twist and turn the map, revealing hidden paths or making obstacles disappear simply by shifting your perspective. Anything concealed from your view is erased from reality. A wall that blocks your way can vanish, while a secret passage can suddenly emerge.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Cassette Boy - Date Announcement Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
